# victoriametricscloud_deployments (Data Source)

Fetches the list of VictoriaMetrics Cloud deployments.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `deployments` (Attributes List) List of deployments. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deployments))

<a id="nestedatt--deployments"></a>
### Nested Schema for `deployments`

Read-Only:

- `cloud_provider` (String) Cloud provider.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp of creation.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the deployment.
- `name` (String) Human-readable name of the deployment.
- `region` (String) Region of the deployment.
- `status` (String) Current status.
- `tier` (Number) Tier identifier.
- `type` (String) Type of the deployment.
- `version` (String) Version of VictoriaMetrics.
